bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: New S3 Code Path Ignores TuriCreate SSL Runtime Config Values
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.config.set_runtime_config.html#turicreate.config.set_runtime_config>runtime config values</denchmark-link> for and are not used by the new S3 code path.
